channel.title: Server question
channel.description:
1. How can i change the position of the shopkeeper e.g. Giles ? When i logged in, they all stand here me, it sucks...
2. How can i change the price/delete the items in the shop ?

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“deathnote777, post:5, topic:384999”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=480766.msg3520007#msg3520007 date=1299345170]
Check your CFG or Config folder and look for autospawn or NPCSpawn. The first set of numbers are the ID of the NPC, the XCoordinate and the YCoordinate. Find Giles ID and then search for it and change the relevant numbers.

About the shops, you’ll have a Shop.cfg file in the same folder as your NPCSpawn - this contains the items and amounts in the shops. Then find the item in question in your Items.cfg file (same folder again) and you can change your item prices here. The numbers go: Item ID, Low Alch price, High Alch price, Shop price. So it’ll be the 4th numbers for every item.

In your config folders make sure you always use the TAB key for spaces, otherwise you’ll get errors.

Download my project tools in my signature for a load of lists and other helpful things.
[/quote]But in the item CFG, i get like 15 number for me to type (included state)

And where can i search for Giles ID ?[/quote]
Search Giles in NPC.cfg.

And there are 15 numbers because they are all the bonuses etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“belhelmiel, post:2, topic:384999”]This is really easy
okay for your first one you can either change starting and death location in config.java or npc location in spawn-config search it in your folder by opening your source and pressing CNTRL F then its like this

spawn = 2881//id	2907//coordx	4445//coordy	0//height	1//walking=1 not walking = 0	38//maxhit	500//atk	200//def	Supreme//short description

second is even easier to change prices go in prices.txt first is the id for the item second is the price example
100 10
id is 100 10 gold is price
for the shops go in shops.cfg

shop = 90//shopid	General_Items//shopname	1//selltype	1//sell type again	952//itemid	100//ammount	1436//id	100000//amountNOTPRICE	10010//id	100//ammount NOT PRICE

I hope that helped
ALSO your stupid for not posting if its Delta or PI thats why no one helped you! And if its not pi for prices its in items.cfg and for shops shops.cfg and youll have to figure that out yourself because i dont use delta anymore >.> and delta sux so if thats what ur using switch to pi![/quote]
Yeah, you’re one to talk about stupidity.

  1. Your grammar fails.
  2. Fail comments are fail (in your code, if you don’t know what that means).
  3. Delta does not “sux”.

Read full topic

About the shops, you’ll have a Shop.cfg file in the same folder as your NPCSpawn - this contains the items and amounts in the shops. So it’ll be the 4th numbers for every item.

In your config folders make sure you always use the TAB key for spaces, otherwise you’ll get errors.

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Check your CFG or Config folder and look for autospawn or NPCSpawn. The first set of numbers are the ID of the NPC, the XCoordinate and the YCoordinate. Find Giles ID and then search for it and change the relevant numbers.

About the shops, you’ll have a Shop.cfg file in the same folder as your NPCSpawn - this contains the items and amounts in the shops. Then find the item in question in your Items.cfg file (same folder again) and you can change your item prices here. The numbers go: Item ID, Low Alch price, High Alch price, Shop price. So it’ll be the 4th numbers for every item.

In your config folders make sure you always use the TAB key for spaces, otherwise you’ll get errors.

Download my project tools in my signature for a load of lists and other helpful things.

Read full topic

item.title: Server question
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

This is really easy
okay for your first one you can either change starting and death location in config.java or npc location in spawn-config search it in your folder by opening your source and pressing CNTRL F then its like this

spawn = 2881//id	2907//coordx	4445//coordy	0//height	1//walking=1 not walking = 0	38//maxhit	500//atk	200//def	Supreme//short description

second is even easier to change prices go in prices.txt first is the id for the item second is the price example
100 10
id is 100 10 gold is price
for the shops go in shops.cfg

shop = 90//shopid	General_Items//shopname	1//selltype	1//sell type again	952//itemid	100//ammount	1436//id	100000//amountNOTPRICE	10010//id	100//ammount NOT PRICE

I hope that helped
ALSO your stupid for not posting if its Delta or PI thats why no one helped you! And if its not pi for prices its in items.cfg and for shops shops.cfg and youll have to figure that out yourself because i dont use delta anymore >.> and delta sux so if thats what ur using switch to pi!
